#include<stdio.h>
typedef unsigned long long ul;
int main(){
int two[]={2,4,8,6};
int three[]={3,9,7,1};
int four[]={4,6};
int seven[]={7,9,3,1};
int eight[]={8,4,2,6};
int nine[]={9,1};
int tc;
scanf("%d",&tc);
while(tc--){
    ul n,p,result;
    scanf("%llu %llu",&n,&p);
    int k=n%10;
    if(p==0){result=1;}
    else{
	if(k==0)result=0;
        else if(k==1)result=1;
        else if(k==2)result=two[(p-1)%4];
        else if(k==3)result=three[(p-1)%4];
        else if(k==4)result=four[(p-1)%2];
        else if(k==5)result=5;
        else if(k==6)result=6;
        else if(k==7)result=seven[(p-1)%4];
        else if(k==8)result=eight[(p-1)%4];
        else if(k==9)result=nine[(p-1)%2];
        }
    printf("%llu\n",result);
    }
return 0;
}
